parts.text: {"word":"experto","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"専門家 (スペイン語、イタリア語、ポルトガル語)","english_definition":"expert (Spanish, Italian, Portuguese)","examples":[{"sentence":"El experto en economía dio una conferencia sobre la inflación. (Spanish)","translation":"経済の専門家がインフレに関する講演を行った。"},{"sentence":"L'esperto ha analizzato il dipinto. (Italian)","translation":"専門家がその絵画を分析した。"},{"sentence":"O experto em vinhos recomendou um bom vinho tinto. (Portuguese)","translation":"ワインの専門家が良い赤ワインを勧めた。"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["especialista","profesional","maestro","perito"],"antonyms":["aficionado","principiante"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の 'expertus' (試された、経験済みの) に由来。'experiri' (試す、経験する) の過去分詞。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/eksˈpeɾto/ (Spanish)","/esˈpɛrto/ (Italian)","/eʃˈpɛɾtu/ (Portuguese)","syllables":"ex-per-to"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"expertos"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Experto' はスペイン語、イタリア語、ポルトガル語で「専門家」を意味する名詞です。英語の 'expert' と同義ですが、言語が異なります。文脈に応じて適切な言語で使用する必要があります。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["experticia (専門知識、鑑定 - スペイン語)","expertise (専門知識 - 英語からの借用語)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"N/A","frequency_google_ngram":"N/A","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"N/A","text":"This word is not English. It is the Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese word for 'expert'. It refers to someone with a high level of skill or knowledge in a particular field."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Soy un experto en programación. (Spanish)","translation":"私はプログラミングの専門家です。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"専門家"},{"sentence":"È un esperto di arte rinascimentale. (Italian)","translation":"彼はルネサンス美術の専門家です。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"専門家"},{"sentence":"Ela é uma experta em culinária francesa. (Portuguese)","translation":"彼女はフランス料理の専門家です。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"専門家"}]}
